0: If I had a star for every time you brightened my day, I'd have a galaxy in my hand
2: Baby, are you the sun? Because you’re the center of my universe
3: Hey beautiful! Your face is like a moon. Always glowing
4: You’re so attractive, the gravitational disturbance is causing my galactic center to elongate
5: Hey baby, I’m not just going to show you the world, I’ll show you the universe
6: Hey baby, are you made up of dark matter? Because you’re indescribable
7: If a star fell every time I thought of you, the sky would be pitch black
8: Of all the planets in all the solar systems in all the galaxies, you appeared here on mine…
9: You know what's faster than the speed of light? My heart when I've just thought of you
10: Are you an alien? Because you just abducted my heart
11: If you were a laser, you’d be set on “stunning”
12: You must be the North Star, because the light around you guided me here
13: The Universe must revolve around you, because your gravitational forces are bangin'
14: Who took the stars out of the sky and put them in your eyes?
15: I'm attracted to you like the Earth is attracted to the Sun--with a large force inversely proportional to the distance squared
16: I need three things: the sun for the day, the moon for the night, and you for a whole life
17: Every time I look at you, I feel like an astronaut...your beauty makes me float
